intro.description: Follow these instructions to quickly validate Symbian OS projects and files with CodeScanner.

item.title: Configure CodeScanner
item.description: Use the CodeScanner preference panels to configure how CodeScanner validates projects and files.

item.title: Run CodeScanner
item.description: Click Project > Run CodeScanner to scan the current Symbian OS project and generate reports.

subitem.label: Right-click a project and select Run CodeScanner to scan the project folder and files
Select a project and click Run > Run CodeScanner on Project MMP to scan the selected .MMP file, plus any user include path(s)/source file(s)/resource file(s) listed in the .MMP file
Select a project and click Run > Run CodeScanner on Project INF to scan the selected .INF file, plus any .MMP file(s) listed in that .INF file

item.title: Review CodeScanner results
item.description: Review the reports generated by CodeScanner to learn how well the project faired.
